longDescription:
The lightweight and manoeuvrable Dyson V6 cordless vacuum provides cord-free, hassle-free cleaning with the same suction power as a conventional corded vacuum cleaner on a number of floor surfaces.

Suitable for all surfaces

Remove fine dust from hard floors with the V6?s motorised cleaner head, fitted with carbon-fibre filaments as well as nylon bristle strips to reach deeper into carpeted floors. The Dyson V6 also converts into a small handheld vacuum for tough tasks and confined spaces. Plus, a Max Power mode provides up to seven minutes of greater suction for more difficult tasks.

Patented Dyson Cyclone technology

Powered by the Dyson digital V6 motor, the Dyson cordless vacuum is equipped with 15 cyclones, arranged across two tiers, that work in parallel to increase airflow and capture fine dust for enhanced performance, while whole-machine filtration captures allergens and expels clean air.

Convertible cleaning

Clean from floor to ceiling with ease, thanks to the lightweight and balanced design. The motorised cleaner head can be used on all floor types, and the cordless vacuum can also be converted into a handheld so you can get into all those hard-to-reach places ? perfect for spot cleaning in the home or car.

For those trickier tasks, the Dyson V6 also comes with a rigid crevice tool and a combination tool, both of which can be stored conveniently next to the vacuum on the space-saving wall-mounted docking station.

Hygienic dirt ejector

With a built-in hygienic dirt ejector, you can conveniently empty dust from the 0.4L bin in a single action with no messy bags or fiddly catches ? simply push the button to release the contents and carry on as normal.
